column4: my x session just crashed and I was in an open konsole running a command that is still running is there a way i can get it back?
i'm back in my x session but i can't figure out how to see my konsole session
you probably can't restore what you had been running.  but run 'sudo /etc/init.d/?dm start' to get kdm back?
konsole session would be gone if X crashed
